name: 离散小波变换°
title: 题解 P6365 【众数出现的次数】

content:
## 思路

Hash，统计每张牌有多少人有

注意某人两种出牌法结果相同时，该数该人只计一次

## 代码

语言：Ruby

```ruby
#C:\Ruby26-x64\bin -w
# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
n = gets.to_i

H = Hash.new(0)

for i in 0..n-1
    l, r = gets.split.map(&:to_i) 
    r ^= l
    H[l] += 1
    if r != l then H[r] += 1 end
end
max = 0
ans = 1000000000
H.each_key{|i|
    if H[i] > max then
        max = H[i]
        ans = i
    end
    if (H[i] == max) and (i < ans) then
        ans = i
    end
}
puts ans
```
